title: House Rules
description: It takes a wealth of collected experiences, emotions, successes and failures to craft the personality of a true Alpha MaleJack Gordon, real estate broker, licensed builder, Juris Doctorate, has had his fair share of strife. His ability to cope, to fall down and pick himself back up has lead him to a place where he believes he has it all. Friends, money, cars, more women than he can count, and a club in Detroit where he can exorcise his inner demons, fill his days and his nights.When he walks up to a penthouse door on a hot Ann Arbor summer afternoon, frustrated, exasperated and ready to call it quits after hours of condo shopping with a wealthy couple, the last thing on his mind is meeting his destiny.House Rules: The Jack Gordon Story. A prequel novella of the Stewart Realty Series.
author: Liz Crowe
